name: Miracle Lantern Generation
description:
You are summoned by your friend Natasha, known for her crazy antics, to try and recruit interesting people to form an adventuring party. Only chaos can ensue...

FEATURES:

  • 3,000+ words in length (full prologue)
  • Nameable protagonist
  • Play as a dude or a chick (slight difference in dialogue in some places)
  • 2 bad ends, 1 abrupt ending
  • Mismatched CC assets
  • No music because I did not get that far in development
  • A very random story with a lot of whacky encounters

Miracle Lantern Generation (a title I got from using the Auto Shoujo title generator) was a random, comedic experimental VN I was writing just for fun back in 2013. I still find it amusing to this day, and thought since I did finish up until the prologue, to share it for historical purposes. Because I had so much fun writing my part in the Reverse Robin collab, I wanted to write more crack stories, and I even re-used my "guy who's always yelling" character from RR (named him Ran here). Although I also used the lady in red sprite, she is not the same person from RR (then again that whole game people kept changing identities lol). 

Despite how silly this unfinished game was, I hope it'll at least make you smirk even just a little. I have virtually left it untouched, save for fixing some scripting errors to make sure it works and giving it a menu image,
